item.title: $100 Challenge: Family Fun by the Ponds
item.description: Grandpa’s granddaughters take on a lighthearted $100 challenge across four ponds — a family-friendly day full of laughs and outdoor adventure.

media:content.media:title: $100 Challenge: Family Fun by the Ponds
media:content.media:description: Grandpa’s granddaughters take on a lighthearted $100 challenge across four ponds — a family-friendly day full of laughs and outdoor adventure.

item.title: Weekend Plans at the Farm
item.description: The twins share their weekend vibes and invite you to join the conversation — family, outdoors, and plenty of fun under the open sky.

item.title: Twins, Kayaks, and a Surprise on the Water
item.description: A day of fishing takes an unexpected turn as the twins encounter something unusual on the property — handled with good humor and country sense.

item.title: Twins Tackle the K10 Squarebody Chevy
item.description: The twins team up to bring classic style back to life, working on their K10 Squarebody Chevy with plenty of laughs and garage banter along the way.

item.title: Twins Try TikTok’s Dumbest Idea — It Gets Dangerous
item.description: The twins take on recent TikTok trends

item.title: Field Test: Tank-Grade Gear in the Wild
item.description: Join the team as they put heavy-duty equipment to the test on the farm — exploring how power, precision, and practicality come together outdoors.

item.title: Sisters, a Choice, and One Critical Shot
item.description: When her sister picks the gun, the stakes couldn’t be higher. One miss could change everything in this gripping true story.

item.title: A Risky Shot Changes Everything
item.description: A tense moment unfolds when one sister takes aim — and the other chooses the weapon. A story of pressure, choices, and consequence.

item.title: Big Machines, Bigger Prep for Deer Season
item.description: From tractors to loaders, watch how heavy machinery helps get everything ready for deer season efficiently and safely.

item.title: Getting Ready for Deer Season with Heavy Gear
item.description: See how heavy equipment is used to clear land, set trails, and prepare the grounds for deer season — hard work meets outdoor tradition.

item.title: Can Walmart’s budget gear handle a real trip?
item.description: Grandpa and the twins take Walmart’s camping gear on an actual outdoor adventure, from fishing to setting up camp, they find out what really holds up.

item.title: Getting Ready for Deer Season with the Big Equipment
item.description: The twins join Grandpa to prep for deer season, firing up the heavy equipment and getting everything set for a big outdoor adventure.

item.title: Didn’t expect dove to taste this good!
item.description: After a successful hunt, Grandpa and the twins head to the kitchen to cook up their catch, and the dove turns out way better than anyone expected.

item.title: Testing Walmart’s Cheapest Camping Gear with Grandpa & the Twins
item.description: Twins and Grandpa put budget camping gear from Walmart to the test, from setting up camp to seeing what actually holds up outdoors.

item.title: Grandpa Puts Walmart’s Budget Gear to the Test
item.description: Grandpa and the twins head outdoors to see how Walmart’s low-cost camping gear performs in real conditions, from setup to survival.

item.title: The Twins Think They Can Hunt Better Than Grandpa
item.description: Hunting day in the countryside. They’re convinced they can do it better than him.

item.title: Hunting Day with Camo Gear
item.description: Tonight is the night!

item.title: Grandpa Tests Walmart’s Budget Outdoor Gear
item.description: Grandpa takes affordable Walmart hunting and outdoor gear into the field to see how it really performs during a day outdoors.

item.title: Boomer Takes the Twins Huntin’ (Catch, Clean, Cook)
item.description: A full outdoor experience as Boomer and the twins head out to hunt, prepare their catch, and cook together for a true family adventure.

item.title: Hunting Must-Haves for the Outdoors
item.description: Before heading into the woods, here are a few essentials every hunter should bring — simple gear that makes every trip smoother and safer.
